channel.title: Auto-Ssh on Marcos Azevedo (aka psylinux)
channel.description: Recent content in Auto-Ssh on Marcos Azevedo (aka psylinux)

item.title: Auto SSH
item.description: auto-ssh.sh :: This script will mount a auto file system using ssh and will open a ssh session with X11 Forward activated. You must set the Environment Variables first in order to use this script.
